storyInfo: Silverlance Pegasus's entrance to the city causes a ruckus, the Plastic Knight and Justyna confront Platinum head on, and the Doctor meets Malkiewicz once again. However, with the events of the day getting more intense by the minute, can anyone truly keep to their ideals?

attributes.text: 'This world is the very last enemy that the knights shall face.'
'The cities should have stood still above the earth. Instead, they fed on their citizens' sweat and toil, and even began to creep their way forward.'
'The cities are living monsters. Now, gather everyone to rise up against these fortresses. Let us return to them the purest glory there is!'
'Let grassland be grassland again. Let sky be sky. Let the people be resolute once more. Let our glory last forever!'

attributes.content: What's happening? Where are the campaign knights headed? The Adeptus?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: They went to the Wall of Champions exhibition hall, where the champions of years past are granted their awards and have their portraits displayed.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Why...? Shouldn't they be going after the government?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: The Board of Directors is discussing that right now. The way I see it, the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi's trying to save face, and this is their first step.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: As for their next step... well... they might try to impose martial law with the garrison.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: But in this day and age, things aren't going to be as simple as holding a knife to somebody's neck... The foolish knights haven't realized that.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: The era of violence is long behind us.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Sorry, but you'll have to pay Area 0 another visit. The blackout will take a toll on the Infected shelter and treatment center.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: See if it's run into any problems.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Report, Mr. Spokesman. The power grid... is starting to recover! We're working to restart it now!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: A silver ray of light makes its way through the darkness.
The extravagant appearance is surrounded by a boisterous audience.
The streetlights flicker, before the colorful neon lights start to rouse the city from its brief slumber.
The Silverlance Pegasus seems out of place against the backdrop of the neon billboards.
However, all those who are present: tumultuous passersby, the panicking knights, and the excited tourists...
All of them have the same misconception. They think the Pegasus is the source of the light.
And the city is slowly coming back to life behind them.
Grandmaster Ioleta.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: It's been a while, Liam.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: You've ventured far. Alas, it doesn't seem we have much time for rest.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: We don't need rest. There is nothing more urgent than cleaning up the filth for Kazimierz's sake.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: Heh, look at you... Impatient as always.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Would you like to see tonight's main course?
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Margaret Nearl...?
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: She should not have refused your invitation. She could have been the finest among our ranks and avoided her fate.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: Yet she's back in Kazimierz now, even stepping into that false arena... Did exile really change Margaret Nearl?
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: You fought her before. Do you think that's the kind of person she is?
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Hmm... Time can change everything. It might have changed her too.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: Look at the wall behind you, Liam. Look at the champions of Majors past.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Why do you think these knights of this slowly collapsing era shine so brilliantly, even now?
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: An exceptional knight or two means nothing, Grandmaster.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: The knight competitions are still blasphemous and the root cause of Kazimierz's downfall.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: Each of my journeys back to the Grand Knight Territory fill me with sorrow. Our people are losing respect, and our noble ideals have become a tired joke.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: Perhaps... but that has always been the case since the campaign knights left the Grand Knight Territory.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Alas, the times belong to the young ones. Our conclusions no longer matter.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: So you too have realized as much, Doctor.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I should have expected no less.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.options: We can't go too overboard right in the middle of Kazimierz.;My first priority is the safety of Amiya and all our operators.;None of you would want us to act rashly.

attributes.content: I understand... Nearl didn't want us to return to your side during the Major to begin with.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: But I couldn't ignore the information I got from the local Infected. It was getting more and more dire by the minute... I thought I had to let you and Amiya know.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: No, you made the right decision, Shining.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If the Infected are really facing... inhumane treatment in Area 0, then we can't stand idly by for the sake of our own 'safety.'
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Still... the Doctor's concerns are reasonable too... Kazimierz, Ursus, and Lungmen are all different...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: We could bomb the facility now, rescue all the Infected, and skip town.;We could talk to the General Chamber and buy out all the remaining Infected.;We could report this to the National Council, and let the Adeptus handle things.

attributes.content: Violence is out of the question.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If we cross that line, Kazimierz has the power to knock us over in a split second.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We're in the dead center of the Grand Knight Territory. This country might be fundamentally different from Ursus, but... this is still a nation of knights.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No matter how intense its internal conflicts have gotten, this is still Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rhodes Island can't make an enemy of this place.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Uhh... W-We probably can't do that...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even if we could buy all the Infected with money... what happens after that? You think the people of the Grand Knight Territory will just stop getting infected?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Besides, that would only turn the Infected into a commodity.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And that wouldn't solve anything.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The Adeptus Sprawiedliwi... We still don't know the whole truth of Area 0.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The Adeptus Sprawiedliwi and the K.G.C.C. are not on the best of terms, and the Adeptus's attitude towards the Infected is ambiguous at best... It's possible they've been tolerating them right from the start.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If that really is the case... what could Rhodes Island do?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: What will you do?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.options: We'll solve their problems their way.

attributes.content: Over there! After her!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Gah!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: (The power's back already... Knowing Sona, she'll find a way to rendezvous.)
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Call for backup right now—
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Turn the corner here—Nng!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Just as I'm enjoying my time lounging around Area 0... the lights go off on me.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I almost got the impression the Armorless Union was finally so stingy they stopped paying their checkpoints' power bills. Up until I got the backup request, that is.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Platinum...!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: You again...?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: This really makes me wish you and Flametail Knight got a harder beating last time.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Too bad... harder I'm beat, the harder I fight back.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Now out of the way—!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: You never learn, do you...? Guess I'll have to teach you another lesson.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: (She's keeping her distance—As long as I block her shot, I'll have a chance to return her attack!)
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: She's here! Help Platinum!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: (Crap! Behind me—?!)
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Urgh!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Ngh...! Did she shatter the streetlight?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: What if the shards cut my face? Sheesh...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Justyna!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Ashlock, get out of there.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: We'll hold her back somehow.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Alright!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Don't even think about it!
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Grr... what a pain. Let me take cover first. I'll find you...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: A standard-issue light crossbow doesn't have that range...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: No, are there two of them—?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Fartooth, looks like she's on to me.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Time to move, then.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Never get into a sniper war with the Armorless. Then again... It's two-on-one right now.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: (They stopped... Did they change positions? Smart.)
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: (If I'd known this would be such a pain, I would've ignored the call for backup...)
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: (Still...)
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Platinum closes her eyes.
She thinks back to something her parents told her long ago.
They told her that her sharp eyes would bring honor and glory to the family.
Has she found glory yet?
I got you now, Szewczyk.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Urgh—?!
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: An arrow brushes past Szewczyk's face, fierce as a windstorm.
A few centimeters' difference and his brain would be torn to pieces.
—She's fighting from such a distance?!
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Talk to me, Szewczyk!
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Dammit! Don't stop! Keep moving!
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Hnn—
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: This arrow's a present for you... Merry Christmas.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Special arrowheads... And they go hard.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: She can pin down our positions even in complex urban terrain like this?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: They're gone...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Did they get away?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I'm not one to run like that, Platinum.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: You... What did you do to my family?!
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: What did you do to them?!
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: You realized you can't fight me at range, so you're making this a melee?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Good thinking.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Ngh—
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Pathetic... A father ending up like this because he crossed the Armorless Union.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: You little—!
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: I didn't kill your wife and child.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: —Where are you hiding them?!
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: If you just did what the Armorless Union wanted, I could get you on the phone with them..
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: You want me to betray Pinus Sylvestris?
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Are you a father... or are you a knight?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Do you have to go so far for the Infected, Szewczyk?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Don't move.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: That's as far as you go, Platinum... At this range, your reflexes are no match for my bolts.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Make your choice.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Grr...
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: None of you... give a damn about us knights...
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Anyone can become a knight by joining the competitions. It's easier if you're born into knight nobility, though, yeah.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The knighthood... is kind of just a disappointing dream.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Tch...!
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: —Is pride more important than your family?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I was never going to trust you anyway, you dirty assassin!
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Do it, Fartooth!
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Looks like order has returned to the streets.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: That was a huge ruckus...
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Did Sona and her friends do all that?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Perhaps... there are others fanning the flames.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Their hearts are filled with anger. They want to rise up against their unfair treatment, and the Infected's fight... will end up exploited by another party for another purpose.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I've seen tragedies like this time and again.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Are you thinking about helping them?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Your choice is between fighting for the Infected and fighting as a knight. Those choices couldn't be more mutually exclusive these days—
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: —The injustice that the Infected face is just the tip of the iceberg. Suffering takes more forms than our eyes can see.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I believe there will be those who will uphold justice for the Infected, and I trust that they will achieve just that.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Margaret...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: But it's not up to us to rescue them. It'll all be meaningless if they find themselves rescued by those who already have a firm conviction.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: A rare visitor.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: It's been some time, Sir Młynar.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: Don't 'Sir' me. You're the only knight here.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: If you're here for Margaret, I'm afraid you'll be disappointed.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: It has been years since I last came back to the Grand Knight Territory. I am shocked to find our hero's estate... in this shape.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: Have the sisters moved out?
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: My apologies... That is your family issue.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: Was there something else...?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Sir Młynar—
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: Stop calling me that.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Others may look down on you, but we will not.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: Even if Margaret strayed onto the wrong path and her younger sister is still young, the Nearl family didn't earn our respect riding on a legacy of fame.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: The boastful merchants have not realized this fundamental idea, and that is why they do not understand the actions that knights take.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: And, truly, just seeing you in good health eases my mind.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: You mean my appearance? Spare me the pleasantries, sir.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: If you truly have any respect for me, please leave.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Sir Młynar.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: We have the utmost respect for you... no, for the Nearl family.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: The age of heroes is long behind us...
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Does a mere citizen of Kazimierz like me really deserve such respect from a Silverlance Pegasus?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: What a bizarre evening, Doctor...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It'll be daybreak soon. I'm sorry I couldn't come sooner. The K.G.C.C. has a lot on its hands, after all...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.options: Tell me your thoughts on Area 0.

attributes.content: I'd like to think... there's no hidden meaning in that question.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: You are a clever one.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Right...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Do you think that... the way the Grand Knight Territory treats its Infected is a reasonable measure?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: You don't need to answer me. Both you and I know the answer—It's only a compromise.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: We could neither make the perfect, humane solution nor bring ourselves to go with the bloody, primitive answer, and this is the result.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I'm not sure if you've noticed, but our society today is built on top of all kinds of unreasonable things. You might want to poke through our history books a little.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: You may not know this... but after the nation of pegasi was overthrown in the upheaval wrought by the Nightzmora and this country of knights came to be, it was the affinities who actually banded together first.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: The affinities toiled away for the knights' profits and tended their lands. Then, they came together, and chased the tyrannical knights off the stage.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: And now? The K.G.C.C. controls both a hitman agency and the competition knights, and those who are being controlled will always try to rise up and break free of tyranny—
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: History repeats itself, Doctor.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: The spokesman before me had some dirty dealings too. He paid the price for them, and now it's my turn to step into this position, pressing forward no matter how hard the job.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Does all this fit your concept of morality? Is it 'reasonable?'
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I don't know how you've come to know this, but you've no doubt already noticed...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: The way the General Chamber has decided to deal with those who get injured in the arena, those whose Oripathy has progressed beyond control... is to put them out of their misery.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Is it unreasonable? Of course. I want to tell them 'no' myself.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: But do we have to keep treating those Oripathy patients, when this disease is incurable?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Each day that Oripathy remains incurable is yet another day where coexistence is out of reach.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.options: What you're talking about is murder.

attributes.content: Everyone who found it unreasonable has been eliminated, creating this thoroughly reasonable history. Fortunately, I've accepted this truth. You understand me, don't you?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: You're trying to take on Kazimierz... and I suggest you stop.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: We may have other options, and if you can think of anything, I'll be more than willing to help.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: But not right now.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: The prime suspect in last night's blackout is none other than the Infected knights.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Let's suppose the blackout caused a traffic accident... or an elderly person who relies on a ventilator stopped breathing because of it—
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Will we have to turn a blind eye to tragedies like these in the name of helping the Infected?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Allowing the Infected to participate in the competitions in large numbers has been a source of stress to everyone—
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: And this stress comes not from some organization or people out there. It comes from society itself, Doctor.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.options: But the Infected are dying as we speak, and we are doing nothing about it.;You're right. 'We may have other options.';......

attributes.content: There are many people dying of unnatural causes right this moment. Disease, Catastrophe. We can't help everyone.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: True...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: If you have an idea... I'm sure you'll get it done.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: But please remember what I just said. Don't treat this whole affair like you're helping the elderly cross the street.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: The contradictions that persist in Area 0 are complicated.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Sorry... Perhaps I've gone too far with my words.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It'll benefit the both of us if you could calm down and think all this over, carefully.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: ...Doctor.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Someone here to see you.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I'll get out of your way...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: And don't get the wrong idea... If possible, I would like to be on your side.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: That said, it's difficult to find the one best answer out of all the unreasonable things we can do nothing about.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: You're right... The blackout, the Radiant Knight, and the Blood Knight... It all fueled the Infected knights' will to resist.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Before everything gets out of hand, I hope both you and I can keep casualties... to a minimum.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: 'Goodness pays off,' or so it's often said, but I'm afraid this no longer holds true in our society. Unless, that is, you reach out and grab hold of the payoff yourself.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz
